overview: Reserved doctor Dolf Dietrich is awakened from a wet dream by sexy boy toy Trent Ferris. Dr. Myles Landon has an sexual tension-filled encounter with patient turned lover Brandon Wilde, Doctor Dolf finally makes his wet dream a reality with young, injured football player Ian Levine, while Ian struggles with his relationship with his hot, hung, lover Daddy Myles Landon.
title: Doctors & Daddies
